author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: LIVE Twitter chat with Kunal Kemmu on Friday, October 9, 2015 at 3 PM
text:
Kunal Kemmu started his career as a child actor and has impressed the audience with his power-packed performance in films like Kalyug, Golmaal 3 and Go Goa Gone. Now, he is all set to stun the audience with Guddu Ki Gun. The trailer is out and has garnered much attention online.
Times of India has organised a LIVE Twitter chat with Kunal Kemmu on Friday, October 9, 2015 at 3 PM. You can also be a part of this chat. Post your questions for Kunal, tag it to our TOI Twitter handle, @TOIEntertain and use the hashtag #KunalKemmuLive in your questions.
Post your questions by clicking on:
@TOIEntertain
You can also mail your questions for Kunal Kemmu at toievents2014@gmail.com.
The best questions will be answered by the actor during the chat.
Sample question: @TOIEntertain Which is your favourite Bollywood movie? #KunalKemmuLive
Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
